adventuring_gear.name: Antitoxin
adventuring_gear.description: +5 alchemical bonus vs poison for 1 hour

adventuring_gear.name: Barrel
adventuring_gear.description: Holds 10 cubic feet of liquid or dry goods

adventuring_gear.name: Candles (10)
adventuring_gear.description: 10 candles, each burns 1 hour, 5-ft dim light

adventuring_gear.name: Case, Map or Scroll
adventuring_gear.description: Leather tube for maps and scrolls

adventuring_gear.name: Cold Weather Outfit
adventuring_gear.description: Wool coat, linen shirt, wool cap, gloves, cloak, boots

adventuring_gear.name: Explorer's Outfit
adventuring_gear.description: Boots, breeches, belt, shirt, jacket, gloves, cloak

adventuring_gear.name: Lamp, Common
adventuring_gear.description: Burns 6 hours on 1 pint of oil, 15-ft radius

adventuring_gear.name: Saddle, Military
adventuring_gear.description: +2 to Ride checks to stay mounted

adventuring_gear.name: Torches (10)
adventuring_gear.description: 10 torches, each burns 1 hour, 20-ft normal light

adventuring_gear.name: Traveler's Outfit
adventuring_gear.description: Boots, wool breeches, sturdy belt, shirt, jacket

potions.name: Potion of Bull's Strength
potions.effect: +4 enhancement bonus to Strength for 3 minutes

potions.name: Potion of Cat's Grace
potions.effect: +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity for 3 minutes

potions.name: Potion of Bear's Endurance
potions.effect: +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution for 3 minutes

potions.name: Potion of Invisibility
potions.effect: Invisible for 3 minutes or until attack

potions.name: Potion of Haste
potions.effect: +1 attack, +1 AC, +30 ft speed for 5 rounds
